attributes.action: ask Ocean Colour Scene to bring Policeman and Pirates back to the live set for the next tour.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Policeman and Pirates is a great song from the aclaimed album Mosley Shoals dispite watching Ocean Colour Scene all over the country I cannot remember hearing this great song live. We ask for your support in this worthwile campaign.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
